mapper.select: SELECT g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS groupMainImg, g.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS groupIntroduce, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, COUNT(mg.MEMBER_NO) AS currentPopulation, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS maxPopulation FROM "GROUP" g JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON g.GROUP_NO = mg.GROUP_NO JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION HAVING COUNT(mg.MEMBER_NO) / g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION < 1 ORDER BY g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION / COUNT(mg.MEMBER_NO) ASC

SELECT g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS groupMainImg, g.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS groupIntroduce, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS maxPopulation, COUNT(mg.MEMBER_NO) AS currentPopulation FROM "GROUP" g JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON g.GROUP_NO = mg.GROUP_NO JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE mg.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION
